oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hikayat Darma Taʻsia : manuscript, 1838
Hikayat Sultan Harun Rasyid
Romance of Darma Taʻsia
Romance of Harun Al-Rashid
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Munsyi, Muhammad Ali bin Abdul Latif (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 68r), copy completed in Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1253 [February 1838] in the hand of Muhammad Ali bin Abdul Latif Munsyi.
Written in one column, 10 lines per page, in red and black.
With: Sabil al-Muhtadin li ʼl-Tafaqquh fi Amr al-Din (ff. 70v-93v).
MS Indo 26. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Malay in the Jawi-Arabic script.
